body.name: The Laundry Alternative Drop Compact Washer - Countertop Washing Machine & Spinner, Space Saver, Stainless Steel Drum, Apartment-Friendly, Convenient Drain Hose, Easy Cleaning, 4.4 lb. Capacity

byLineInfo.name: Visit the The Laundry Alternative Store

features: COMPACT & PORTABLE: The Laundry Alternative Drop! Compact Washer offers a super compact 11" diameter, 21" tall design for small living spaces like apartments, RVs, and travel, making laundry convenient anywhere.

HIGH RPM SPIN CYCLE: Experience the power of the high RPM spin cycle that comes with The Laundry Alternative Drop! Compact Washer. This unique feature ensures your clothes are not only thoroughly cleaned but also significantly drier after the cycle, reducing the time you need to spend on drying.

NO HOOKUPS NEEDED: Setting up the Drop! Compact Washer is a breeze. With no washer/dryer hookup or vent required, all you need is a regular 110V wall outlet. This means you can place it wherever it suits you best, without the limitations of traditional laundry setups.

SPACIOUS LOAD CAPACITY: Don't let its compact size fool you – the Drop! Compact Washer comes with a spacious 4.4 lb. load capacity. This means you can wash larger items like towels and sheets without a problem.

DURABLE & RELIABLE: The Laundry Alternative takes pride in the durability and reliability of the Drop! Compact Washer. Features a fashionable electronic timer and a stainless steel drum, built to last with whisper-quiet operation, ideal for apartments and shared spaces.
body.description: Compact and Portable Drop! Laundry Alternative Compact Washer Experience the convenience of a small washing machine that is powerful enough to get the job done, yet compact and portable enough to fit in any living space! The Compact and Portable Drop! Laundry Alternative Compact Washer is the perfect solution for those who want to save space without sacrificing functionality. Finally have a high-quality washing machine without sacrificing valuable living space with the Compact and Portable Drop! Washer. Washer is easy to use with no hookup required. Its high RPM and spin cycle leave clothes fresh, and the stainless steel inner tub makes maintenance easy. Plugs into 110V outlet. High RPM and effective spin cycle leave clothes clean and fresh, while its stainless steel inner tub and removable spin drum make maintenance a breeze. Save money on laundry costs by doing laundry at home with the Compact and Portable Drop! Washer, which is built to last and can provide many years of use. Smart investment for those on a budget who want to save money without sacrificing convenience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Compact and Portable Design The Drop! Washer is designed with a compact 11" diameter and 21" tall frame that easily fits on a countertop, making it perfect for small living spaces such as apartments, dorms, RVs, and travel. It weighs only 13 lbs. and has a unique space-saving design with a removable drum that allows for a larger washing capacity than other compact washers. High RPM and Effective Spin Cycle The Drop! Washer boasts a high RPM and effective spin cycle, leaving clothes clean and fresh. With a 4.4 lb. capacity, it can fit a large bath towel or queen sheet. Removable Drum for Increased Capacity Our portable washer comes with a removable drum that allows for a larger washing capacity than other compact washers. You can easily remove the drum to add more clothes or wash larger items such as blankets or bed sheets. Durable and Built to Last The Drop! Washer is built to last, with a durable electronic timer and high-quality materials such as a stainless steel inner tub. Its one-of-a-kind tabletop washer design ensures it can withstand frequent use and continue to perform at a high level for years to come.

Say Goodbye to Laundromats with The Laundry Alternative Inc. The Laundry Alternative Inc. offers a range of energy-efficient laundry products that are perfect for those looking to save time and money. Our products are designed to be portable, compact, and lightweight, making them ideal for apartments, RVs, boats, cabins, camping, and more. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little machine, not perfect.
reviews.reviewText: Now that we have had this machine for a couple of months and washed a decent amount of laundry I feel confident writing this review. We don't have a laundry facility in our building so we needed a small machine that could wash and keep up with baby laundry. After doing much research we landed on this one and I'm glad we did!Overall it's a great machine, but it's not perfect.Pros:- VERY lightweight and maneuverable. It's very easy to carry around different rooms of your house; use it in 1 room and store it in another.- Gets clothes very clean. I spot treat any stains and this little washer gets pretty much every stain out.- The spin cycle really removes a lot of water. 5 minutes in the spin cycle and then another 15-20 minutes of hang drying and the clothes are pretty much ready to be folded and put away.Cons:- It's small. It initially looks bigger but it's very easy to overload the machine. It takes a few loads to figure out how much you can really wash at once. If the machine makes a weird noise, you have overloaded the machine.- The spin cycle works so well that delicate clothes may get damaged. I started putting the more delicate items in mesh laundry bags and that helps a lot!- Washing one load takes a few steps and is quite hands on. Every step is really simple, but you need to go through a wash cycle, rinse cycle and spin cycle. For the wash and rinse cycle you need to manually add and then drain the water. And for the spin cycle you need to move your laundry from the machine into the spin basket.What we can wash in 1 load (these are separate loads that we've tried and they don't overload the machine and the items come out squeaky clean):- Around 10 baby outfits (onesies, pants and tops or footed pajamas, or any fabric item that is approximately the same size)- 1 queen size sheet- 4 crib sheets- 8 muslin blankets- 3-4 large fleece blankets- lots of adult underwear and socks!Overall this is a great machine! It does exactly what it needs to do and it's perfect for our small space. Because of the size and the multiple steps to do a load of laundry it does not replace a full size machine, but that shouldn't be expected anyways. We are very happy with our purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good little washer
reviews.reviewText: So far I've loved using the Drop. I've washed my 2 year old granddaughters clothes, my t shirts (4), socks, u derwear, wash clothes, all washed seperate loads. Clothes are clean. This helps me from having to carry so much downstairs to laundry room.Cons: drain hose clip should be further down and hose a little longer because water sometimes comes out. Power cord could be longer. Size is good but a little bigger would be great.Loving this so far. I've used 6 times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars leaking before i can even turn it on !!!
reviews.reviewText: i was looking forward to not having to go to the laundromat as often and to my laundry in my small apartment, SADLY once i put water in to try out this washer it leaked all the way to the bottom and out onto the floor, im glad i did not have this plugged into the wall because water and electric shock = you die !!!! very sad that i wasted my money now i have to try and find another washer so that i can do laundery in my place and not have to pay someone to do my laundery, dont spend your money and if you do order this DO NOT TURN IT ON BEFORE YOU PUT WATER IN !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It washes OkBut needs stronger spin cycle..But it is very quiet..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Might send it back!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It's a cute little washing machine, but it makes a huge amount of noise during the wash cycle. I don't think it's normal at all. I'm going to probably send it back. It washes well but whatever is making that noise you hear in the video I've attached can't be good for the longterm viability of this machine. I put a t-shirt in to wash just for this video because you can't hear the noise this thing makes in the advertising video the company put out. Perhaps I got a poorly assembled machine. I've contacted the seller for a solution. If I don't get one, it's going back.Update: Laundry alternative is a great company for their customer service. I contacted them and they immediately sent me another machine. They stand by their products and again their customer service is stellar. Customer service is very important to me and I would buy from them again.Final update: So here's what happened. I was sent a second washing machine as stated above. That machine after using it was quite and it washed very well. However it had a leak, and you won't believe this but Laundry Alternative sent me another machine. This final machine is working perfectly. No metallic rattling sounds, no leaks, and it's quite. What's happening is they were being damaged in shipping. It's not the product itself, and although they are packed well it seems the shipping company doesn't care how they handle the packages. My last machine was just laying on its side, and wasn't placed all the way under my porch awning and it was raining. The package was wet but luckily my machine was fine. Laundry alternative is a great company, and I will buy from them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a small but powerful and roomy good quality washer
reviews.reviewText: I know several reviews complained about water leaking problem. I think they fixed the issue. Because in this one package I received, in addition to a white plastic drain hose which leaks water everywhere, there's a new rubber like gray hose which is twice as long and with the end attaches to the drain opening deeply and securely - no leak at all!The spin dry feature works surprisingly well - clothes comes out close to a regular washer. The wash and rinse features work well as well.
